sn22.33:4.2: “* Yaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn22.33:4.3: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:4.5: Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn22.33:4.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:4.8: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:4.11: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn22.33:4.13: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:5.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya.
sn22.33:5.3: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī’”ti?
sn22.33:5.6: “Na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti.
sn22.33:5.7: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn22.33:5.8: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:5.10: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.33:5.14: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
